short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: converter for uuid and short ids

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly convert between standard and short UUID formats with this extension. It supports both formatted UUIDs (36 characters with dashes) and unformatted UUIDs (32 characters without dashes), transforming them into a concise 22-character short UUID. You can also easily convert short UUIDs back to their full 36-character format. Perfect for developers working with unique identifiers in a more compact form!

Key Features:

- Convert 36-character formatted UUIDs or 32-character unformatted UUIDs into short UUIDs (22 characters).
- Convert short UUIDs back to the standard 36-character formatted UUID.
- Clean and easy-to-use interface for quick conversions.

Make handling UUIDs more efficient with this handy converter!
